name: Bac2O
description:
In Bac2O, you play as a bacteria, you get to choose out of 2 currently, and the goal is to #TaketheLake.

Note: There isn't an end game button so you don't have to exit it through your task manager.

This game was made by Spud Buds Studio for a Game Design Project.

Jake Anderson - Programmer

Steven Aprill - Artist

Kayleigh Callaway - Programmer

Tim Schultz - Artist
